content: linen coasters a free pattern from kristen of knitionary the beloved eyelet edged washcloth praised for its simple beauty has been resized for your wine glass subtle stitch changes have been made to accommodate for the lack of elasticity when knitting with linen yarn flax & twine daytime linen gauge 28 st = 4 in garter stitch needles size 1 2 25 mm size 4 24 square a single skein will make 6-7 coasters co 1 st row 1 kfbs 2 sts row 2 kfbs k1 3 sts row 3 kfbs k2 4 sts row 4 kfbs k3 5 sts row 5 k2 yo k to end 1 st increase repeat row 5 until you have 40 sts begin decreases decrease row k1 s1 k1 psso yo s1 k1 psso k to end 1 st decrease kfbs k into front of stitch as usual repeat decrease row until 5 sts remain then insert r needle into back of same st and slip off onto r needle-1 st increase next row s1 k1 psso k to end 1 st decrease s1 with yarn in back slip one st as if to next row k2tog 2x 2 sts remain purl next row k2tog 1st remains psso pass the slipped stitch over pass fasten_off last st and weave in ends slipped st over knitted st just worked block and pour yourself a beverage https //www kristenrettig com/
